title: Person Of Interest Highlights Part1
author: NZHiphopscaper
comment:
I saw the pilot last year and never stopped watching this show.  It doesn't get much better than this!  VERY disappointed this show was only nominated for 1 Emmy - for Sound Editing (they deserved it)!  Very few shows can hold a candle to this one.  Thank you JJ Abrams for the concept and the remarkable Michael Emerson & Jim Caviezel for bringing it all to life for us!  Best New Drama!  Best Actors!  Best Supporting Actors!  Best Direction!  Best Writing!
Period.
One of the best series ever!Great action from Jim Caviezel and Michael Emerson!Love when jogn fights and Fints with his magic at computers!
John is so beautiful... and his voice? OMG
That flaskback with Jessica chokes me everytime! Makes me wonder how many times love is silent
I just want to THANK-YOU from the bottom of my heart!!!! For me, person of interest is the greatest show of all time, and having this video is such a gift! Once again --Thanks:)
description:
***This Video may contain Spoilers if you havent seen some episodes***

Part 1 of 2 of some of my favourite POI scenes from episodes 1-9. I put a bit of music on some of the scenes, but its not overly done. The video may be too long for some people, but in my opinion there is so many good scenes its hard to narrow it down.

I hope somebody enjoys watching :) 

I purchased both songs used in this video from Itunes.

Part 2:
